bibl.title: Marriage Payments and Succession Strategies in the Documents from the Judaean Desert.

series.title: Supplements to the Journal for the Study of Judaism.

bibl.note: Concerns mainly the Babatha archive. - [Introduction.] - The Movement of Property. - Marital Payments. - Deed of Gift.

bibl.title: Law in the Documents of the Judaean Desert

bibl.seg: SATLOW Michael L., Marriage Payments and Succession Strategies in the Documents from the Judaean Desert.
Ranon KATZOFF and David SCHAPS (Edd.), Law in the Documents of the Judaean Desert = Supplements to the Journal for the Study of Judaism. 96 (Leiden, 2005) pp. 51-65.
Concerns mainly the Babatha archive. - [Introduction.] - The Movement of Property. - Marital Payments. - Deed of Gift.
